title: What band or musical artists goes by a name that is not actually a name of any of the performers? - Quora

response.answer_text: A few others that I’m not seeing in any of the other answers: Traveling Wilburys: Like the Ramones, the members adopted “Wilbury” alter-egos, but none of them was *actually* named Wilbury.Veruca Salt: Named after a character in the movie “Charlie and the Chocolate Factory.”Save Ferris: Named after the titular character in the movie “Ferris Bueller’s Day Off”Danny Wilson: Named after the titular character in the movie “Meet Danny Wilson”Dropkick Murphys: Nobody in the band named “Murphy”Franz Ferdinand: Named after the assassinated archduke of Austria-Hungary.Belle and Sebastian: From a 1960s novel about a boy and his dog.Paul and Paula: From the name of their biggest hit (they were actually named Ray and Jill)Tesla: Nikola Tesla is not, in fact, in the band.Jesus and Mary Chain: Similarly, neither Jesus nor Mary is in this band.The Hollies: Named in honor of Buddy Holly.Luscious Jackson: The actual Luscious Jackson is a basketball player.The Righteous Brothers: They may have been righteous, but they weren’t named “Righteous.”Marilyn Manson: Brian Warner blended “Marilyn Monroe” and “Charles Manson” to create the name of his stage persona.Steely Dan: The two constant members of the band are named Walter and Donald, not “Dan” or “Daniel.” This one comes from the name of a dildo in “Naked Lunch.”

The Ramones. None of them were named Ramone. And they weren’t related. The name came from a rumor that Paul McCartney checked into hotel rooms with the name “Paul Ramone”.Alice in Chains was a bunch of guys who weren’t named Alice. And none of them performed in chains.Jethro Tull was named after an 18th-century agriculturalist. Sadly that agriculturalist didn’t live long enough to play in a rock band.Bathory was named after Elizabeth Bathory. But the band has no blood-bathing Hungarian countess in its lineup. Instead, it’s mostly the work of Tomas Börje Forsberg, AKA: "Quorthon",The Tony Danza Tapdance Extravaganza had nothing to do with Tony Danza or tapdancing.
